item.description: Tonight will be night #3 of the Battle of the Bands Competition. Extreme Country Stampede Tour is in search for a local (New England) Band to open for Nashville Artists that will be performing at the Extreme Country Stampede in Hopkinton, NH June 25th and 26th and 1 Year Artist Development Deal with A1 Entertainment and CrossRoads Touring. The winner will move on to compete in the finale to be held on April 8th. LIne-up Little Memphis, Kalisa, Tom Dixon, and Boys of Rockingham. Dancing / Give Aways / Raffles / Line dance competition. Come Join the FUN and support country music !! http://www.nhcma.com/index.html UpReach Therapeutic Riding Center http://www.upreachtrc.org/ The winner of the Battle gets a 1 Year Artist Development Deal with A1 Entertainment and CrossRoads Touring, will perform on stage with Nashville performers Saturday, June 25th in Hopkington, NH where they will also be presented with "Battle of the Band Champion" hand made belt buckles. You don't want to miss out on this event !! See you at Midnight.............Rodeo Bar www.midnightrodeobar.com
item.name: Battle of the Bands
